```{r setup, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  warning = FALSE,
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)

library(grapher)
library(htmltools)
```


```{r, echo=FALSE}
img(
  src = "grapher-banner.png",
  class = "img-responsive responsive-img"
)

p(
  style = "text-align:center;",
  tags$a(
    tags$i(class = "fa fa-rocket"),
    "Get Started",
    class = "btn btn-primary",
    href = "articles/get-started.html"
  ),
  tags$a(
    tags$i(class = "fa fa-desktop"),
    "CRAN Dependency Graph",
    class = "btn btn-default",
    target = "_blank",
    href = "https://shiny.john-coene.com/cran"
  )
)

p(
  style = "text-align:center;",
  "Interactive graphs in R, an integration of the many amazing works of",
  tags$a(
    "Andrei Kashcha.", 
    href = "https://github.com/anvaka", 
    target = "_blank"
  )
)

br()

div(
  class = "row",
  div(
    class = "col-md-4",
    style = "text-align:center;",
    tags$i(class = "fa fa-5x fa-cube", style = "color:black;"),
    br(),
    h4("3D and 2D Layouts")
  ),
  div(
    class = "col-md-4",
    style = "text-align:center;",
    tags$i(class = "fa fa-5x fa-file", style = "color:black;"),
    br(),
    h4("Accepts any format")
  ),
  div(
    class = "col-md-4",
    style = "text-align:center;",
    tags$i(class = "fa fa-5x fa-code", style = "color:black;"),
    br(),
    h4("Easy to use")
  )
)

br()
```

```{r, echo=FALSE, eval=FALSE}
tags$a(
  target = "_blank",
  href = "https://shiny.john-coene.com/cran",
  img(
    src = "cran.png",
    class = "img-responsive responsive-img"
  )
)
br()
br()
```

You can get it with the `remotes` or `devtools` package.

```r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("JohnCoene/grapher")
```
